actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend the Clean Air Act to establish certain high altitude performance standards.

summary.text: Amends the Clear Air Act to establish procedures for review of instructions for high altitude performance adjustments for motor vehicle emission control systems by the Administrator of the Environmental Protection Agency. Authorizes the appropriation of such sums as may be deemed necessary by the Administrator to carry out the Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Clean Air Act to establish certain high altitude performance standards.
